name: A Bubble Too Far!
description:
A Bubble Too Far is a simple-to-play bubble pop browser game that mixes up the format and forgoes bubble patterns in favour of a never-ending chain of random bubbles, with a new row created with each projectile bubble fired.

Each game uses 3 colours that can be switched between as needed to remove key groups to try and stop any bubbles moving down into the spikes or the projectile. Doing so would be "A Bubble Too Far".

Scores are published in a retro arcade style where you can select a username to publish your highscores and see where you rank against other players.
